verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>. Unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H982>trust<s%> in thee: let me not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, let not mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5970>triumph<s%> over me.
Yea, let none that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on thee be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> which <S%H898>transgress<s%> without <S%H7387>cause<s%>.
<S%H3045>Shew<s%> me thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H734>paths<s%>.
<S%H1869>Lead<s%> me in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> me: for thou art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; on thee do I <S%H6960>wait<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and thy <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>; for they have been ever of <S%H5769>old<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> not the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>, nor my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: according to thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> thou me for thy <S%H2898>goodness'<s%> sake, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H2896>Good<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: therefore will he <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
The <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H1869>guide<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: and the <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H3925>teach<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
All the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> unto such as <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
For thy <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H5545>pardon<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; for it is <S%H7227>great<s%>.
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? him shall he <S%H3384>teach<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>.
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3885>dwell<s%> at <S%H2896>ease<s%>; and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H5475>secret<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him; and he will <S%H3045>shew<s%> them his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>ever<s%> toward the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he shall <S%H3318>pluck<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> out of the <S%H7568>net<s%>.
<S%H6437>Turn<s%> thee unto me, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me; for I am <S%H3173>desolate<s%> and <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged<s%>: O bring thou me <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
<S%H7200>Look<s%> upon mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>pain<s%>; and <S%H5375>forgive<s%> all my <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; for they are <S%H7231>many<s%>; and they <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>cruel<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>.
O <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me: let me not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>; for I put my <S%H2620>trust<s%> in thee.
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me; for I <S%H6960>wait<s%> on thee.
<S%H6299>Redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, out of all his <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
